name: Wonderland VR Experience
description:
Enter the curious world of Wonderland in this short VR experience.

Experiment with scale in the potion room, converse with the opinionated caterpillar in the grove, have a happy unbirthday with the Mad Hatter, and try not to lose your head in the Queens gardens!

Thank you to all our talented voice actors!

  • Ryan Emery - Caterpillar
  • Kate Elder - Cheshire Cat
  • Jesse Vakitini - Mad Hatter
  • Mark Thompson - March Hare
  • Desiree Wolter - Dormouse
  • John P - White Rabbit
  • Mel Sklenars  - Queen of Hearts
  • Tom Lorenti, Jason McKay, Rowan Koch - Card Soldiers

This project was made by SAE students in collaboration with the Western Australian Museum for their free Wonderland exhibition.
